Module humphrey.partsproject
Package humphrey.controller

Class AddPartController

java.lang.Object
humphrey.controller.AddPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the Add Part screen. It takes data from the user and creates a new In-House or Outsourced Part object.
